an3.150:1.1: “When a foolish, incompetent untrue person has three qualities they keep themselves broken and damaged. They deserve to be blamed and reproved by sensible people, and they create much wickedness.
an3.150:1.3: Unskillful deeds by way of body, speech, and mind. …
an3.150:2.1: When an astute, competent true person has three qualities they keep themselves healthy and whole. They don’t deserve to be blamed and criticized by sensible people, and they create much merit.
an3.150:2.3: Skillful deeds by way of body, speech, and mind. …”
